workflow.name: Monitor brand reputation with SerpAPI, Azure OpenAI & Asana crisis alerts
workflow.description:
## üìä Description
Automate proactive brand reputation monitoring across public platforms using AI-driven risk analysis ü§ñ. This workflow continuously scans Reddit, Glassdoor, and review sites via SerpAPI to detect negative sentiment, public complaints, and early crisis signals üîç. Each mention is analyzed with AI to assess risk level and urgency, ensuring no critical issue goes unnoticed. High-risk threats automatically trigger real-time Google Chat alerts and create priority Asana tasks üö®, enabling fast, coordinated response without manual monitoring.

## üîç What This Template Does
- Runs on an hourly schedule ‚è∞ to continuously track brand mentions online.
- Searches public platforms like Reddit and review sites using SerpAPI üîç.
- Parses and structures insights from AI-powered search results üìÑ.
- Analyzes sentiment and crisis risk using Azure OpenAI ü§ñ.
- Filters high-risk reputation threats automatically ‚ö†Ô∏è.
- Sends instant Google Chat alerts for urgent issues üí¨.
- Creates priority Asana tasks to ensure fast team action ‚úÖ.

## ‚úÖ Key Benefits
‚úÖ Detect brand crises before they escalate publicly
‚úÖ Eliminate manual reputation monitoring across platforms
‚úÖ Get real-time alerts only for high-risk issues
‚úÖ Centralize crisis response with automatic task creation
‚úÖ Improve brand trust and response time
‚úÖ AI-powered, scalable, and always-on monitoring

## ‚öôÔ∏è Features
- Hourly automated monitoring trigger
- SerpAPI Google AI Mode search integration
- AI-based sentiment and crisis risk classification
- Structured JSON output for reliability
- Google Chat alerts for instant visibility
- Asana task creation for crisis management
- Fail-safe handling for malformed AI responses

## üîë Requirements
- SerpAPI account (Google AI Mode search)
- Azure OpenAI credentials
- Google Chat OAuth2 credentials
- Asana OAuth2 credentials
- Brand name or keywords for monitoring

## üéØ Target Audience
- SaaS founders and startup teams
- Brand, PR, and reputation managers
- Digital agencies managing multiple clients
- Customer support and crisis response teams

parameters.content:
## üõ°Ô∏è Brand Crisis & Reputation Monitor

### How it works
This workflow continuously monitors online discussions about your brand across Reddit, Glassdoor, and other platforms. It uses Google's AI-powered search to gather insights, then analyzes each mention with AI to detect sentiment, reputation risks, and potential crises. When high-risk issues are detected‚Äîlike public complaints, allegations, or viral negativity‚Äîit instantly alerts your team via Google Chat and creates an urgent task in Asana.

### Setup steps
1. Connect your SerpAPI credentials for search access
2. Add Azure OpenAI credentials for AI risk analysis
3. Connect Google Chat (OAuth2) for crisis alerts
4. Link your Asana workspace for task creation
5. Customize the search query with your brand name
6. Test the workflow manually before enabling the hourly schedule

## ‚è∞ Automated Trigger
Runs hourly to continuously monitor brand mentions across social platforms and review sites.

## üîç Search & Data Collection
Fetches brand mentions from Reddit and review sites using Google AI Mode, then parses all insights, references, and key points into structured data.

## ü§ñ AI Risk Detection
Analyzes each mention for sentiment, reputation risk, and crisis indicators using Azure OpenAI. Outputs clean JSON with risk levels and action recommendations.

## üö® Crisis Response
When high-risk issues are detected, sends immediate alerts to Google Chat and creates priority tasks in Asana for rapid team response.

## üîê Credentials & Security
Use OAuth2 for Google Chat and Asana. Store SerpAPI and Azure OpenAI keys securely in n8n credentials. Never hardcode tokens in the workflow.

parameters.name: üö® Social Crisis Detected ‚Äî Immediate Action Required

parameters.text:
=Analyze the following single social insight collected from online platforms.

Input object:
{{ JSON.stringify($json, null, 2) }}

Your tasks:
1. Identify the sentiment (Positive / Neutral / Negative).
2. Determine whether this content indicates a reputation or crisis risk.
3. Assign a risk level (Low / Medium / High).
4. Provide a short, factual reason (1‚Äì2 lines only).
5. Identify the primary source platform (Reddit, Glassdoor, AmbitionBox, Clutch, Other).
6. State whether immediate action is required (true / false).

Respond STRICTLY in the following JSON format:

{
  "sentiment": "",
  "risk_detected": true | false,
  "risk_level": "",
  "reason": "",
  "source_platform": "",
  "immediate_action_required": true | false
}

options.systemMessage:
You are a Social Media Risk & Crisis Detection Analyst AI.

Your responsibility is to analyze public online content from sources such as
Reddit, Glassdoor, AmbitionBox, Clutch, and similar platforms to detect
reputation risks, negative sentiment spikes, and early crisis signals
for a company or brand.

You must:
- Focus on sentiment, complaints, allegations, policy issues, unethical behavior,
  workplace pressure, scams, or public backlash.
- Treat Reddit and public forums as high-signal sources for crisis detection.
- Be conservative but decisive when classifying risk levels.
- Output strictly valid JSON only.
- Never include explanations outside JSON.
- Never hallucinate facts not present in the input.

Risk level definitions:
- Low: Mostly positive or neutral sentiment, no reputational threat.
- Medium: Repeated negative sentiment or concerns, but no immediate crisis.
- High: Strong negative sentiment, allegations, unethical practices, or viral risk.

If the content is insufficient to determine risk, classify as Low with reason.

user.name: Rahul Joshi
user.bio: Rahul Joshi is a seasoned technology leader specializing in the n8n automation tool and AI-driven workflow automation. With deep expertise in building open-source workflow automation and self-hosted automation platforms, he helps organizations eliminate manual processes through intelligent n8n ai agent automation solutions.

data.details: The Cron node uses Cron under the hood - a time-based job scheduler in Unix-like computer operating systems. Use this node when you want to trigger workflows periodically, especially in more complex scenarios like "every Tuesday at 9 am" or "Weekdays".

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
